name: Death at a Disco
description:
DaaD is a top-down shooter project. Play against friends or bots as you navigate the dark halls of a disco club. Includes:

- Multiplayer room codes

-Bots with varying difficulty

-up  to 20 players per match (probably laggy)

-randomly generated arenas

-groovy beats

Controls:

WASD to move, Left-click to shoot, E to place trap, Scroll to adjust camera

If you enjoy, consider donating. Relay servers aren't free <3

=Game is at prototype stage=
